title: (Minister of State at the Department of Children, Disability and Equality) Order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister of State at the Department of Children, Disability and Equality) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department child disability equality) order

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Children, Disability and Equality) Order
(Minister of State at the Department of Children, Disability and Equality) Order
heading: 2. Paul Melia, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Paul Melia, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Children, Disability and Equality, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the 
Department of Children, Disability and Equality, with effect from 23 January
text_norm: 2 paul melia particular whose address deposited office department child disability equality appointed special adviser hildegarde naughton minister state department child disability equality effect 23 january

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Children, Disability and Equality) Order
(Minister of State at the Department of Children, Disability and Equality) Order
heading: 3. Denise Duffy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Denise Duffy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Children, Disability and Equality, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the 
Department of Children, Disability and Equality, with effect from 23 January
text_norm: 3 denise duffy particular whose address deposited office department child disability equality appointed special adviser hildegarde naughton minister state department child disability equality effect 23 january

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Children, Disability and Equality) Order
heading: GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government,
text_raw:
2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

27 May, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th May, 2025.
